Hyatt

We developed three new food & beverage concepts for Hyatt McCormack Place; a fast casual restaurant, a casual fine dining restaurant, and a new in-door / outdoor upscale bar.

Camp Social

A New Twist on Family Dining: Refurbish waterpark restaurant to create on-trend dining experience.

More Info

Terra Costiera

Red Sauce Refresh: Reimagine Italian concept to capitalize on industry trends.

More Info

SeeSaw

Meet the Modern Cafeteria: Deliver next-generation restaurant quality food in a casual concept.

More Info

Kings Restaurant Group

We assessed and provided recommendations for Kings Restaurant Group, resulting in a successful concept redesign.

Zagame

We evaluated Zagame’s concepts in Australia for potential expansion into the US market.

Mastro’s Restaurants

We developed a real estate strategy and plan for the regional expansion of Mastro Restaurants.

Goose Island

We refined operations, cut food costs, improved gross margins and refreshed the menu for Goose Island Brewery.

Weber Grill Restaurant

We partnered with 3Sixty Dining Intelligence to reposition and refresh the brand, and update the menu for four Weber Grill locations.
